milestones.title: Started ¬ª Undergrad in CSE ¬ª NSU
milestones.description: I started the Computer Science and Engineering undergraduate program in North South University (NSU) in 2002 and completed the degree in 2006 with Summa cum laude. While in NSU, I developed my first website in 2004 for the university robotics club. The second website I built was for the university library in 2006. I also participated in other extra curricular activities like tech fest, programming contest etc.

milestones.title: Started my first job ¬ª NSU Library
milestones.description: Started my first job at NSU Library as a developer. My job responsibility was to improved upon the NSU Library management software.

milestones.title: My second job ¬ª Blueliner
milestones.description: Started my second job at BlueLiner as a Software Engineer. Developed e-commerce, social media portals & video sharing web sites with customized video player.

milestones.title: Freelancer ¬ª Elance ¬ª Upwork
milestones.description: Started as a full time freelancer. Worked on all sorts of different projects - WordPress themes, plugins, full websites, chat applications & video players to name a few.

milestones.title: Freedom
milestones.description: Started working on my own products. Currently working on for complete financial üí∞ freedom üòé
